title: Greenwood of the Fey Sovereign
details: Players will need courage to face an assortment of unsuspected and cunning enemies, wits to survive the magical forces and clever snares, and a silver tongue to make quick friends out of foes.

title: Reckoning of the Gods
details: In the beginning, the adventurers are contacted by a vengeful divine force, either through their cleric, or by means of a shared mystical experience. They learn that the gods are intent on punishing the transgressions of a mad wizard, but their influence is limited by the wizard's own dimensional reality.

title: A Strange Night at the Pint 'n' Pony
details: The little folk meet each night at a special place away from the troubles of big people. Here, after a long day of work, they share simple tales and sip ale. Tonight is nothing new—or is it? Sinister forces emerge during happy hour (hic) at this halfling pub.

title: 101 City Encounters
details: Encounters can turn into significant new adventures, short side tracks, or simply texture. With these added layers, PCs will feel the endless opportunity of the city! This is an ideal gaming tool for DCC Lankhmar campaigns.

title: Welcome to Eastwood
details: Eastwood is the ultimate vacation theme park. Its "wild west" veneer conceals the techno wizardry of a powerful temporal field. After weeks (or months) at the resort, visitors could re-enter life moments after leaving for vacation, and never miss a day’s work.

title: The Towers of Dr.Xill
details: Dr. Xillgracone (aka Dr. Xill) was a genius and madman who experimented with the natural order of life on himself and others. Using super-science devices infused with the raw power of fire and ice, he summoned and enslaved elemental creatures to merge with his human subjects.

title: The Years Between
details: The Years Between is an alternate method for quickly leveling characters in a fantasy role-playing campaign. This 20pp supplemental booklet is specifically styled for Dungeon Crawl Classics by Goodman Games. However, with mild adaptation it can be used for any fantasy roleplaying system.
